name: Corporal Rheems
descriptions: Corporal Rheems is a dead soldier found aboard Mothership Zeta in the cryo lab in the Fallout 3 add-on Mothership Zeta.

An integral part of the medic squad attached to the 108th Infantry Battalion under Sgt. Daniels, Cpl. Rheems was abducted near Anchorage together with the rest of his squad in the middle of the night. The aliens kept him and the others in suspended animation. Rheems was thawed out and brutally probed and experimented upon for the next two centuries, before eventually dying during one of the procedures alongside Corporal Spurlock and Private Mears.
Rheems appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Mothership Zeta.
